title: Support path lengths longer than 260 (MAX_PATH)
body: I'd like to see Windows API's, Command Prompts, File Explorer support a much longer file path. 32,768 (2^15) would be very helpful.

comments.body: It's been 5 years since this post. I'm having the same issue as David. File explorer is limiting path length for file saving in SharePoint which is hurting my entire department. Is there at least a work around?
We are also experiencing this issue when syncing files from SharePoint document libraries to Windows Explorer... This limit needs to be modernized seriously.
please make us possible to enable it for the file explorer. when sync'ing sharepoint libraries via onedrive this is an issue.
